channel.title: Legacy-317 [] UPDATED Daily [] Dicing [] Pictures and more!
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/lf.png[/img][/center]
Hey guys i have been working on my sever with my team and we are about 75% complete with it. We are planning to relese it to the public on March 1, 2012. Its not guaranteed that it will come out but right now its at a 90% chance it is. We bought a vps for the server. You can join the forums to talk to the community and hear updates about the server. I will be posting more pictures and some updates on here but most updates will be on the forum. So join the forums today and be ready to play Legacy-317!
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/administrator.png[/img][u][b]Legacy-317's Server Info![/b][/u][img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/administrator.png[/img]
[b]Links[/b] Forums are up and if i get alot of people that want to join the forums i will put a link up.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBxaP8sS2VI&list=UUlyiUesRWV_VPzGKHfRhn8g&index=1&feature=plcp[/youtube]
[b]The color Red means it hasn't been started. The color Orange means it has been start but not complete. The color Green means its complete.[/b]
[b]Combat[/b] All special attacks Clipping Correct timers Equipment effects (barrows) PvN PvP Weapon degrading (barrows)
[b]Mage[/b] [b] Ancient spells[/b] Dust Ice Shadow Smoke Teleports Clipping [b]Modern spells[/b] Alches Basic combat spells Binding spells Bones to bananas Bones to peaches Charge Curses Enchanting jewelery God spells Iban blast Slayer dart Teleblock Teleports Staffs giving unlimited runes
[b]Range[/b] All special attacks Clipping Crystal bow Dwarf cannon Throwables
[b]Prayer[/b] All prayers Bone burying Ectofuntus Prayer draining
[b]Agility[/b] All obstacles Finish the course to get xp Correct emotes
[b]Cooking[/b] Brewing Cakes Cooking gauntlets Correct burn chance Fish Meat Miscellaneous Stews Pies Pizzaz Potato Toppings Vegetables Wine
[b]Crafting[/b] Dragonleather crafting Leather crafting Mould smelting Stringing amulets Weaving Tanning
[b]Farming[/b] - Farming will not be released when the sever is released it needs a little more work. Allotments Amulet of Nature Bushes Compost bin Flowers Herbs Hops Fruit trees Protecting crops Specials Tool leprechauns Trees
[b]Firemaking[/b] - Firemaking was disabled due to server crashing. Will be fix soon All logs Can't light fires in banks Can't light fires on objects Clipping Colored fires Fires burn out and leave ashes
[b]Fishing[/b] All fish can be caught Bait checking Equipment checking Moving fishing spots Whirlpools Correct Emotes
[b]Fletching[/b] Arrow making Bow making Darts
[b]Herblore[/b] All potions Grinding materials Pouring together doses Weapon poisoning
[b]Mining[/b] - Havent got much time to work on mining hoping to soon All ores All pickaxes Gems Prospecting Rock golem Rocks deplete and regenerate
[b]Runecrafting[/b] Abyss All runes can be made Entering altars Multiple runes Talisman location finding Tiara making Tiaras give the enter option on mysterious ruins
[b]Slayer [/b] All slayer masters All slayer monsters working correctly All task level difficulties
[b]Smithing[/b] Adamant Blurite Bronze Elemental Iron Mithril Rune Smelting Steel
[b]Thieving[/b] Blackjacking Correct caught chance Disarming traps Picking locks Pickpocketing Stalls
[b]Woodcutting[/b] All axes All trees cuttable Bird nests Stumps with respawning Tree spirit
[b]Quests[/b] - Hoping to release these in the future. I got 3 working quest atm. Tutorial Island Black Knight's Fortress Cook's Assistant Demon Slayer Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer Ernest the Chicken Goblin Diplomacy Imp Catcher The Knights Sword Pirate's Treasure Prince Ali Rescue The Restless Ghost Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Sheep Shearer Shield of Arrav Vampire Slayer Witch's Potion
[b]Minigames[/b] Barrows Duel Arena Fight Caves Fight Pits Fishing Trawler Gnome Glider Party Room Warriors Guild Zombie Waves Pest Control Pyramid Plunder Treasure Trails[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Staff List[/b][/u] [b]Administrator:[/b] [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/administrator.png[/img]Go Hard [b]Moderator:[/b] V.I.R.U.S (Virus)
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/administrator.png[/img][u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u][img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/administrator.png[/img]
Login [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/login.png[/img]
Home [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/home-1.png[/img]
Skill Zone [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/skillzone.png[/img]
Agility [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/agility.png[/img]
Fishing [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/fishing.png[/img]
Cooking [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/cooking.png[/img]
Woodcutting [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/woodcutting.png[/img]
Fletching [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/fletching.png[/img]
KBD [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/kbd.png[/img]
Quest [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/quest.png[/img]
Gs Stances [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/stances.png[/img]
Pest Control [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/pc5.png[/img]
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/pc.png[/img]
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/pc4.png[/img]
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/pc3.png[/img]
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/pc2.png[/img]
More pictures coming soon. They are upload ATM

item.title: Legacy-317 [] UPDATED Daily [] Dicing [] Pictures and more!
item.dc:creator: @drew56133 drew56133
item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

[quote=“voetbal645, post:8, topic:432370”]This is runexero base
Did u change anything on this?[/quote]
Its not runexero. And yes i fixed all dupes and got all of the skills working properly. i added 3 quest that are 100% done and working. Me and my team have been working on it for about a a month and its almost done. We will be releasing it soon to the players. When we got this source some of the skills didn’t work. We got all of the skills working but some are disabled due to server crashing and server lag. All skills should be done by the time we release it on March 1, 2012. At this point i have been busy with school and haven’t got a chance to work on anything. So we might release it March 1, 2012 but some skills wont work if i cant get any time by march 1. If you have any more question just pm me.

Read full topic

1: u can’t put ur forums link up without permission so don’t put them up.
2: I don’t like ur mods name “virus”

Well good luck.
[/quote]

Thanks for the support but i can’t post my forums link without permission? And the mod “Virus” is one of my friends. He’s my neighbor.[/quote]
Yes u need to PM a mod for approval of the site,

And u should tell him to change his name, it’s not appealing
